features: Multifunctional: Score goals with the 2-in-1 interactive sports center; shoot free throws into the toddler basketball goal or kick goals into the toddler soccer net
The zebra piano has light-up keys so your little one can follow along or learn to play a song at three different levels; whammy bar and scratch disc enhance fine motor skills and adds cool sounds
A microphone lets kids sing along and hear their own amplified voice; features 100+ songs, melodies, sounds and phrases
Animal band button lets you play with the alligator from Zoo Jamz Guitar and the lion from Zoo Jamz Microphone (each sold separately)
Requires 2 AA batteries (included for demo only; new batteries recommended for regular use); ages 18 months to 4 years; Frustration Free Packaging means it comes easier to open in a plain brown box
body.description: Shoot, score and learn with the Smart Shots Sports Center by VTech. The greatest summer toy for infants and toddlers between the ages 1 and 3 years old. Toss the basketball into the hoop to score points or kick the soccer ball into the net to hear fun sounds. This basketball and soccer goal toy comes with developmental features that translates any kids' sports excitement into a learning thrill. Smart animation above the toy basketball hoop helps your child to stay excited about scoring goals and celebrates every score by keeping count throughout play to establish cause and effect. Build new gross motor skills through interactive play by shooting free throws into the basketball hoop or kicking goals through the soccer net. Encourages kids to actively learn about shapes, numbers and more by pressing buttons, turning gears and flipping pages on the frame of the goal. Great for indoor & outdoor use. This toddler sports toy is meant for children between 1 and 3 years old and includes both a soccer ball and a basketball.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Features Animated LED scoreboard and encourages play with fun animations Scoreboard counts baskets and plays encouraging sounds and phrases More than 50 songs, melodies, sounds and phrases Let the games begin! Toss the basketball into the hoop to score points, or kick the soccer ball into the net to hear fun sounds. The scoreboard counts the baskets, promoting cause and effect and introducing numbers. Press buttons, turn gears and flip pages to learn about shapes, numbers and more. Everyone's a winner with the Smart Shots Sports Center.

Features Have a Ball Tossing and kicking the ball builds motor skills. Discovery & Exploration Animations and sound effects attract your baby's attention and enhance curiosity. Sounds & Shapes Turn the gears or press the shape buttons to introduce chapes, numbers, and playful sounds. Two Ways to Play Shoot a basket or score a goal with the included basketball and soccer ball.

VTech Smart Shots Sports Center VTech Pop-a-Balls - Push and Pop Bulldozer VTech Sit-to-Stand Ultimate Alphabet Train VTech Drop and Go Dump Truck VTech Drill and Learn Toolbox VTech 2-in-1 Learn and Zoom Motorbike - Pink Item Model Number 80-156300 80-506000 80-181900 80-166500 80-178200 80-181750 Age Range 12-36 Months 12-36 Months 12-36 Months 6-36 Months 2-5 Years 12-36 Months Product Description Toss the basketball into the hoop to score points, or kick the soccer ball into the net to hear fun sounds. Drop the colorful balls in the bulldozer and watch as they pop up through the smoke stack, into the scoop bucket and back again. Play ten activities while learning letters, numbers, colors and more. Drop a colorful rock into the top of this cute dump truck and watch it tumble into the bucket to learn numbers. Open the toolbox and get ready for role-play fun with the included drill, hammer, wrench, nails and screws. This 2-in-1 bike has handle bars that move like a real bike and easily transforms from a tricycle for unsteady toddlers into a two-wheel bike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son is just now starting to be able to enjoy this toy. He’s 11 almost 12 months but I bought it at Christmas and he was a little young to fully hold the ball, and understand the concept.I like that it’s interactive, and cheers them on when they score! My son loves praise so it makes him excited haha.You do need about 4 Double AA batteries if I’m correct, that aren’t included but that’s not an issue. As long as you’re aware of that, and prepared when it arrives to put it together.Super simple set up & easy to follow directions.It’s mostly just snapping things into place. It does require a small screwdriver to insert batteries.It’s sturdy, but light weight so it’s very easy for a young child to knock over. That’s the only downside, but I’d assume they don’t want it to be heavy enough to cause harm or injury either.Overall, I think it’s a great toy. Interactive fun and gets your little ones brain thinking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made. Lots of fun for 12 month old grandson.
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome toy! The soccer ball and basketball are well made and little teeth won’t damage them (like some foam made balls). Easy to assemble but batteries not included. You will need a Phillips head screwdriver for assembly.
